summary: While spending the summer in cottage country on the shores of Lake Superior, three teens cope with boredom by testing the limits of their experience.
cast: Jackson Martin|Nick Serino|Reece Moffett|Katelyn McKerracher|Rita Serino|Erika Brodzky|David Disher|Taylor Facca|Lorraine Philp|Kyle Bertrand
title: Sleeping Giant
